description: This file is a shell script responsible for managing the startup, stopping, and restarting of the forwarding service in a network device. It handles different modes like router and bridge, interacts with system events, and manages services like WAN, LAN, and firewall.

methods.name: router_mode
methods.description: Handles specific routing mode configuration, including restarting access points on RPI boards.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Handles starting the forwarding service, managing network modes, and interacting with system components to initialize network services.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Handles stopping the forwarding service and associated network components gracefully.
